settings.features_desc: Soothes, softens, hydrates, prevents Trans-Epidermal Water Loss.
Proprietary blend that helps protect skin from environmental damage.
Buffs away dead skin cells, calms inflammation, and soothes redness for a clearer complexion.

settings.title: Features/Benefits
settings.ingredients:
Purified Water (Aqua), Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Aloe Barbadensis (Leaf) Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Panthenol, Allantoin, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Saccharum Officinarium (Sugarcane) Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Extract, 
Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyquaternium-10, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone PEG-7 Phosphate,
Phenoxyethanol, Tween 20, Caprylyl Glycol, Sorbic Acid.

settings.title: How To Use
settings.description: Apply cleanser to damp face and neck, gently massage into skin and rinse completely. Use daily, morning and night, or anytime your skin needs refreshing. Follow with VI Derm Beauty Treatment Products.
